snippet.title: Burger & Frights - A PS1-style horror game about burgers and a bike ride through a dark forest!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://donitz.itch.io/burger-frights?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt It's a late night and you were craving burgers. It's time to ride home.

Burger & Frights is a short horror game in which the player rides a bike throughout a dark forest. The game was inspired by games such as Rides with Strangers, and a certain horror movie by John Carpenter.

➡️ More from Donitz https://donitz.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
